last_episode_to_air.name: Hunting Heffalumps
last_episode_to_air.overview: Pooh and Friend's expedition failed to catch a Heffalump, but it succeeded in bringing together more very good friends.

name: Mini Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
original_name: Mini Adventures of Winnie the Pooh

episodes.name: What Tiggers Do Best
episodes.overview: Tigger gets stuck up a tree trying to demonstrate that he's the best at bouncing.

episodes.name: Pooh and Tigger
episodes.overview: Pooh and Tigger meet for the first time. Tigger is more pleased than Pooh is with this introduction.

episodes.name: Stuck at Rabbit's House
episodes.overview: Pooh eats a bit too much while visiting Rabbit, and finds he can't quite leave.

episodes.name: The Rain Came Down
episodes.overview: More rain occurs than the Hundred Acre Wood or its occupants can reasonably handle.

episodes.name: Owl's House
episodes.overview: Owl underestimates the wind speed, to disastrous consequences.

episodes.name: Pooh's Game
episodes.overview: Pooh and his friends play Pooh Sticks, but Eeyore interrupts their game, requiring a quick and dirty rescue operation.

episodes.name: The Most Wonderful Thing About Tiggers
episodes.overview: Tigger informs the wildlife in the Hundred Acre Woods in regards to the positive aspects of Tiggers.

episodes.name: Eeyore's House
episodes.overview: Tigger accidentally both destroys Eeyore's house, and the chances to fix said house. Later on, he surprises all of his friends by coming up with a real solution to Eeyore's problem.

episodes.name: Someone Like Tigger
episodes.overview: Tigger becomes momentarily saddened by the lack of any other members of his species. He cheers up when he is reminded that he has very good friends.

episodes.name: Pooh's Balloon
episodes.overview: Pooh attempts an unorthodox method to trick some bees, but is only slightly successful. Christopher Robin helps him get into and out of a sticky situation.

episodes.name: The Jagular
episodes.overview: One brisk winter day, Pooh is following some unfamiliar tracks in the freshly fallen snow. Piglet soon joins him, and before long – Aha! – they notice a brand-new set of mysterious tracks where there had been just one before. What sort of creature could it be, fierce or friendly? Pooh is convinced it just might be a "Jagular!"

episodes.name: Unbouncing Tigger
episodes.overview: Rabbit gets fed up with Tigger's bouncing, but doesn't have the willpower to see his cause through to completion.

episodes.name: Tigger Goes Ice Skating
episodes.overview: Tigger decides that ice skating is what Tiggers do best, despite evidence to the contrary from Rabbit.

episodes.name: Piglet's Drawings
episodes.overview: Piglet's fiends surprise him by drawing pictures of his past adventures with them, both true and exaggerated.

episodes.name: Piglet's Bath
episodes.overview: A pleasant bubble bath convinces Piglet that Kanga is a very nice lady, and that they should be friends.

episodes.name: If I Wasn't So Small
episodes.overview: Piglet sings a sad song about being small and useless, but by the end of it, realizes that he's not quite as useless as he imagines himself to be.

episodes.name: The Expedition
episodes.overview: Christopher Robin leads all of his friends on an expedition to find the North Pole. Surprisingly, Pooh finds it by accident.

episodes.name: Pooh and Piglet Corner
episodes.overview: Pooh and Piglet name a spot in the Hundred Acre Woods for themselves, and build Eeyore a house on it.

episodes.name: Lullabee
episodes.overview: Pooh attempts to procure his lunch by inducing a soporific effect on a swarm of bees. While he is successful over the short term, his friends' attempt to help him has the opposite effect.

episodes.name: The Super Bounce
episodes.overview: Tigger attempts to instruct Roo in the art of the The Whoop-de-Dooper Loop-de-Looper Alley-Ooper Bounce.

episodes.name: Pooh's Tummy
episodes.overview: Pooh knows just what his tummy needs in this Mini Adventure of Winnie The Pooh.

episodes.name: Honey Song
episodes.overview: Pooh Bear dreams of a world made of yummy honey -- what more could a bear desire?

episodes.name: The Backson
episodes.overview: Owl tells Winnie the Pooh and friends of a terrible creature -- the Backson

episodes.name: The Bees
episodes.overview: Piglet gets stuck in the middle of Pooh's plan to catch a sticky treat in this Mini Adventure of Winnie The Pooh.

episodes.name: Tiger and Eeyore
episodes.overview: Eeyore goes through a major "tiggerization" in this Mini Adventure of Winnie The Pooh.

episodes.name: Stout and Round
episodes.overview: Pooh sings a song about the importance of incorporating exercise and a good diet into a healthy lifestyle.

episodes.name: Climb a Tree
episodes.overview: Pooh attempts unsuccessfully to climb a tree, while ruminating on what his eating habits are making him do.

episodes.name: Eeyore's Tail
episodes.overview: Eeyore's tail has fallen off, but Christopher Robin can soon fix the problem. Pooh shows an unusual interest in a balloon.

episodes.name: Heffalumps and Woozles
episodes.overview: Pooh has a terrible dream thanks to Tigger's inability to pronounce animal names correctly, or tell the truth about their eating habits.

episodes.name: Pooh and Gopher
episodes.overview: Gopher interrupts Pooh's train of thought. He does not manage to recover it.

episodes.name: Geniuses
episodes.overview: Piglet isn't so sure about Pooh and Friends BIG plan to get honey.

episodes.name: Roo Goes Swimming
episodes.overview: Roo decides to go for a swim while Winnie the Pooh and Friends set out on an expedition to find the North Pole.

episodes.name: Piglet's Party
episodes.overview: Piglet's friends decide the best way to show him that he's special is to throw a party in his honor.

episodes.name: Kanga and Roo Move In
episodes.overview: Winnie the Pooh and Friends were excited to see that two new someones were moving into the Hundred Acre Wood.

episodes.name: House at Pooh Corner
episodes.overview: Tigger and Pooh decide to build a new house for their friend Eeyore.

episodes.name: Roo and Lumpy
episodes.overview: Roo makes an unexpected friend in this Mini Adventure of Winnie the Pooh.

episodes.name: Tiger's Balloon
episodes.overview: Tigger decides there is only room for one hero in the Hundred Acre Wood.

episodes.name: Eeyore's Contest
episodes.overview: Pooh ignores his rumbly tummy, and heads to Christopher Robin's house to make sure Eeyore's tail is returned to the proper place.

episodes.name: Heffalump Lesson
episodes.overview: Roo discovers a giant footprint that could only belong to the dreaded Heffalump.

episodes.name: Hunting Heffalumps
episodes.overview: Pooh and Friend's expedition failed to catch a Heffalump, but it succeeded in bringing together more very good friends.
